sense.def:
A hinge
je premičen zgib iz kovine, lesa ali plastike, ki spaja dva predmeta tako, da eden od njiju lahko prosto niha.

seg.quote: The door was ripped from its hinges.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
hinges on a fact or event
ali
hinges upon a fact or event
, je odvisen od nekega dejstva ali dogodka.

seg.quote: Everything hinged on what happened to the United States economy.
